arabic: إِنَّهُۥ لَا يُحِبُّ ٱلْمُسْتَكْبِرِينَ
english: Indeed, He does not like the arrogant.

arabic: وَٱللَّهُ لَا يُحِبُّ كُلَّ مُخْتَالٍۢ فَخُورٍ
english: And Allah does not like every arrogant boaster.

arabic: وَيْلٌۭ لِّلْمُطَفِّفِينَ
english: Woe to those who give less [than due].

arabic: وَٱللَّهُ لَا يُحِبُّ ٱلظَّـٰلِمِينَ
english: And Allah does not like the wrongdoers.

arabic: فَأَعْقَبَهُمْ نِفَاقًۭا فِى قُلُوبِهِمْ إِلَىٰ يَوْمِ يَلْقَوْنَهُۥ بِمَآ أَخْلَفُوا۟ ٱللَّهَ مَا وَعَدُوهُ
english: So Allah caused hypocrisy to settle in their hearts until the Day they will meet Him because they failed Allah in what they promised.

arabic: وَلَا تَعْثَوْا۟ فِى ٱلْأَرْضِ مُفْسِدِينَ
english: And do not commit abuse on the earth, spreading corruption.

arabic: وَٱعْدِلُوا۟ هُوَ أَقْرَبُ لِلتَّقْوَىٰ
english: Be just; that is nearer to righteousness.

arabic: إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ لَا يُحِبُّ ٱلْمُعْتَدِينَ
english: Verily, Allah does not like transgressors.

arabic: إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ لَا يُحِبُّ كُلَّ خَوَّانٍۢ أَثِيمٍۢ
english: Indeed, Allah does not like those who are treacherous and sinful.

arabic: وَلَا تَقْرَبُوا۟ مَالَ ٱلْيَتِيمِ إِلَّا بِٱلَّتِى هِىَ أَحْسَنُ
english: And do not approach the property of an orphan, except in a way that is best.

arabic: وَلَقَدْ أَرْسَلْنَا رُسُلًا إِلَىٰ قَوْمِهِمْ فَجَآءُوهُم بِٱلْبَيِّنَـٰتِ فَمَا كَانُوا۟ لِيُؤْمِنُوا۟
english: And We had certainly sent messengers to [their] people before you, and they came to them with clear proofs, but they were not to believe.

arabic: فَوَيْلٌۭ لِّلَّذِينَ يَكْتُبُونَ ٱلْكِتَـٰبَ بِأَيْدِيهِمْ ثُمَّ يَقُولُونَ هَـٰذَا مِنْ عِندِ ٱللَّهِ
english: So woe to those who write the 'scripture' with their own hands, then say, 'This is from Allah.'

arabic: وَإِذَا قِيلَ لَهُمْ ءَامِنُوا۟ كَمَآ ءَامَنَ ٱلنَّاسُ قَالُوٓا۟ أَنُؤْمِنُ كَمَآ ءَامَنَ ٱلسُّفَهَآءُ
english: And when they are told, 'Believe as the people have believed,' they say, 'Should we believe as the foolish have believed?'

arabic: خُلِقَ ٱلْإِنسَـٰنُ مِنْ عَجَلٍ
english: Indeed, man was created of haste.

arabic: وَمَن يُشْرِكْ بِٱللَّهِ فَكَأَنَّمَا خَرَّ مِنَ ٱلسَّمَآءِ
english: And whoever associates with Allah – it is as though he had fallen from the sky.

arabic: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ يُحِبُّونَ أَن تَشِيعَ ٱلْفَـٰحِشَةُ فِى ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ لَهُمْ عَذَابٌ أَلِيمٌۭ
english: Indeed, those who like that immorality should be spread among those who have believed will have a painful punishment.

arabic: وَٱخْفِضْ لَهُمَا جَنَاحَ ٱلذُّلِّ مِنَ ٱلرَّحْمَةِ
english: And lower to them the wing of humility out of mercy.

arabic: ٱلَّذِينَ إِذَا ٱكْتَالُوا۟ عَلَى ٱلنَّاسِ يَسْتَوْفُونَ
english: Those who, when they have to receive by measure from men, demand full measure.

arabic: وَيَمْنَعُونَ ٱلْمَاعُونَ
english: And they prevent [others] from helping.

arabic: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ فَتَنُوا۟ ٱلْمُؤْمِنِينَ وَٱلْمُؤْمِنَـٰتِ ثُمَّ لَمْ يَتُوبُوا۟ فَلَهُمْ عَذَابُ جَهَنَّمَ
english: Indeed, those who have tortured the believing men and believing women and then have not repented will have the punishment of Hell.
